Home → About → Jobs → 2x library and information advisors, Ipswich County Library

2x library and information advisors, Ipswich County Library

Download a role profile (PDF).

We’re looking for 2 library and information advisors at Ipswich County Library. We’re looking for individuals who:

  • Have an aspiration to deliver excellent customer service

  • Have excellent interpersonal and communication skills and enthusiasm to build positive and supportive relations with our clients, team, partners and community

  • Have a good level of writing, reading and numeracy skills

  • Are confident and competent in using the internet, email and using a variety of devices and applications

  • Have excellent digital skills

  • Understand Suffolk Libraries’ services and what it delivers

Both positions are for on average 18.5 hours per week and will involve weekend working including Sundays.

The rate of pay is £7/93 per hour.

If you are interested, please send a CV and supporting statement outlining what you could bring to this position and Suffolk Libraries to: recruitment@suffolklibraries.co.uk

The closing date for applications is Wednesday 8 February 2017. Interviews will be held on Monday 20 February 2017.
